DonationPoint.title: Donation Point
DonationPoint.description: Represents a location where donations can be dropped off.

name.description: The name of the donation point.

address.description: The full address of the donation point.

lat.description: The latitude of the donation point.

lng.description: The longitude of the donation point.

hours.description: The opening hours of the donation point.

acceptedItems.description: A list of donation categories accepted at this point.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

CategoryConfig.title: Category Configuration
CategoryConfig.description: Stores the mapping of category keys to display names.

names.description: A map of category keys (e.g., 'clothes') to their display names (e.g., 'Roupas').

/donation-points/{donationPointId}.description: Stores information about each donation point.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information, including their role.

/app-config/categories.description: Stores global application configuration, such as donation categories.
